name: Name of shame for facebook admins
description: This is an extension for marking spam-profiles etc. who try to re-enter a facebook group they have been kicked out from. Mark Zuckerbergs profile is only used for demonstration purposes and is not really a spam-profile.
additional_info:
Demonstration video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kB7xSIV7q0A

How to add new names:

1. Click the "stylish" extension button and select "edit" (See fig. 1).
2. Find the profile url, using Mark Zuckerberg's profile as an example:

https://www.facebook.com/zuck

The end of zuckerberg's url is "/zuck". Some people (or spambots) still haven't figured out usernames on facebook, and are given a profile id instead. If zuckerberg did not have a username, his profile url would be:

https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=4

(yes, this url works, try it)

3. Add the spammer's profile-url to the list (either under /*PERMBAN*/ for red color or /*WARNING*/ for orange), i have added 3 dummy entries that you can use (See fig. 2):

		[href*="<INSERT FACEBOOK USERNAME OR PROFILE ID HERE>"],

This becomes in the example of zuckerberg:

		[href*="/zuck"],

Or, if zuckerberg did not have a username:

		[href*="/profile.php?id=4"],

Changelog:

Added example for color coding for "warnings" for profiles that are not permbanned.
